divs: Sighting DetailsI was sleeping in my room when my mother came in and woke me up saying 'haley, come check out this ufo, there's a ufo outside and we can see it', so I rubbed my eyes got up and went into my mother's room, looked out the Window and there it was. My mother said 'I believe it is because it was just on fox 2 news'. It was really bright at first, then I went downstairs woke my brother up and said 'Jord wake up, come check out this ufo' so we went back into my mother's room and the light had dimmed, but was still there and visible, then disappeared, but about 2 minutes after it reappeared.. After that it disappeared for good. It looked like there were 6 orb like things, flashing colors, and the dots were in a triangular shape, and looked star like.
Summary: hovered in the sky, it would disappear, then re appear.
trends: There have been no other sightings in in the sky heading north.
This sighting has never been favorited.
